comments.body:
Afaik for DSA Priya badrinath is the anchor 
She is good
Prof Sowmyashree is really good, she ensures that everyone understands each topic in class itself, easy to talk to as well
Shivashankar is peace! He doesn't care whether the class is listening or not
fr most of my class literally slept through his lessons and he dgaf
hehe he came in as substitute for my class for a month.. my friends and I played chess and used phones all throughout his class.. he did notice it, then would ask some basic question.
